query: SELECT sessionToken, filename, fileSize, status, totalChunks, uploadedChunks, uploadedBytes, mimeType, createdAt, lastActivityAt FROM resumable_upload_sessions WHERE status IN ('active', 'paused') ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 10;
